dynamic-hibernate.query: SELECT queue_Nm, manual_Status, is_Repeat, expire_Time, interval_Time, dph_Delay_Time, dph_Timeout, new_Pop_ThreadNum, new_Exe_ThreadNum, portion_Pop_ThreadNum, portion_Exe_ThreadNum, create_Tm FROM CSL_QUEUE WHERE 1=1 #if($queue_Nm) AND queue_Nm LIKE :queue_Nm #end #if($manual_Status) AND manual_Status = :manual_Status #end #if($is_Repeat) AND is_Repeat = :is_Repeat #end

SELECT cq.queue_Nm, cq.manual_Status, SUM(cqms.NEW_LEN) new_Len, SUM(cqms.PORTION_LEN) portion_Len, rev_T_Cnt_Mit, rev_T_Cnt_Hor, rev_O_Rate_Mit, rev_O_Rate_Hor, rev_E_Rate_Mit, rev_E_Rate_Hor, dph_T_Cnt_Mit, dph_T_Cnt_Hor, dph_O_Rate_Mit, dph_O_Rate_Hor, dph_E_Rate_Mit, dph_E_Rate_Hor, dph_OD_Cnt_Mit, dph_OD_Cnt_Hor FROM CSL_QUEUE cq LEFT JOIN CSL_QUEUE_MSG_STORAGE cqms ON cq.QUEUE_NM = cqms.QUEUE_NM WHERE 1=1 #if($queue_Nm) AND cq.queue_Nm LIKE :queue_Nm #end #if($manual_Status) AND cq.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end GROUP BY cq.QUEUE_NM
